Package portfolios

Interface BetterStockPortfolio

  • All Superinterfaces:
    StockPortfolio
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdvancedStockPortfolio
    public interface BetterStockPortfolio
extends StockPortfolio
    The BetterStockPortfolio interface extends the functionality of the StockPortfolio interface allowing for the buying and selling of stock on a certain day.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void adjustStockOnDay​(java.lang.String ticker, double shares, java.time.LocalDate date)
      The adjustStockOnDay method adds or removes the specified number of shares of a given stock from the portfolio on a given date.
      java.lang.String distribution​(java.time.LocalDate date)
      The distribution method returns the distribution of stock in this portfolio as a string.
      java.lang.String getCompositionOnDay​(java.time.LocalDate date)
      The getCompositionOnDay method returns a list of stock and the number of shares existent in a portfolio on a given day.
      java.lang.String plot​(DateRange range)
      The plot method returns a visual representation of a portfolio's performance over a time range of WEEK, MONTH, YEAR, FIVE_YEARS, or TEN_YEARS.
      void rebalanceStock​(double expectedValue, java.time.LocalDate date, java.lang.String name)
      The rebalance Stock method rebalances a single stock.
      void savePortfolioToFile()
      The savePortfolioToFile method saves this portfolio to a CSV file that can be loaded into the program at a later date.

      • Methods inherited from interface portfolios.StockPortfolio

        adjustStock, getName, getStocks, getValue, listStocks, setName

    • Method Detail

      • adjustStockOnDay

        void adjustStockOnDay​(java.lang.String ticker,
                      double shares,
                      java.time.LocalDate date)
        The adjustStockOnDay method adds or removes the specified number of shares of a given stock from the portfolio on a given date.
        Parameters:
        ticker - the stock ticker
        shares - the number of shares
        date - the date to complete the transaction on

      • getCompositionOnDay

        java.lang.String getCompositionOnDay​(java.time.LocalDate date)
        The getCompositionOnDay method returns a list of stock and the number of shares existent in a portfolio on a given day.
        Parameters:
        date - the given date
        Returns:
        the string list

      • distribution

        java.lang.String distribution​(java.time.LocalDate date)
        The distribution method returns the distribution of stock in this portfolio as a string.
        Parameters:
        date - the date on which to find the distribution
        Returns:
        the string distribution

      • savePortfolioToFile

        void savePortfolioToFile()
        The savePortfolioToFile method saves this portfolio to a CSV file that can be loaded into the program at a later date. The CSV file is named 'portfolio-name'.csv and is automatically saved to a new "portfolios" directory.

      • plot

        java.lang.String plot​(DateRange range)
        The plot method returns a visual representation of a portfolio's performance over a time range of WEEK, MONTH, YEAR, FIVE_YEARS, or TEN_YEARS.
        Parameters:
        range - the DateRange enum object range

      • rebalanceStock

        void rebalanceStock​(double expectedValue,
                    java.time.LocalDate date,
                    java.lang.String name)
        The rebalance Stock method rebalances a single stock.
        Parameters:
        expectedValue - the expectedValue of the balanced stock
        date - the date on which to rebalance.
        name - the ticker of the stock to rebalance
